name: Rise of the Robots
description:
Rise of the Robots is an arcade-fighting game developed by Mirage Technologies, Mirage and Instinct Design. It was originally released in 1994. It was published by Atari. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Rise of the Robots is available on Game Gear, 3DO, Commodore / Amiga and SNES.
Brian May, Jason Page and Richard Joseph scored the game.
